message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $120. I believe it's a great deal for you, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in buying the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $90 is tempting, I'm hoping for something closer to $100 to make this worthwhile for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
